mapper.select: select name as device_name, year, rate from ( select d.name, s.year, s.rate, s.id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by s.rate desc) as ridx from ( select year, rate,id,device from state_inf where year=#{year} ) s, devices d where s.device = d.id ) as t1 where ridx=1

select name as device_name, year, rate from ( select d.name, s.year, s.rate, s.id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by s.rate desc) as ridx from ( select year, rate,id,device from state_inf where device=#{device} ) s, devices d where s.device = d.id ) as t1 where ridx=1
mapper.insert:
select NVL(max(id)+1,0) from state_inf
insert into state_inf(id, year, device, rate, util) values(#{id}, #{year}, #{device}, #{rate}, #{util})
